tools.description: Posts with geotags from five social networks at once on one map (Twitter, YouTube, Instagram, Flickr, Vkontakte)
search geotagged photos from VK.com
view YouTube geottaged video on map
displays only Flickr photos distributed under a Creative Commons license (250 of the latest for each location)
geottaged photo from Instagram with #cat hashtag
Explore most popular #Twitter trends, hashtags and users on the worldmap
View historical photos taken at a particular location on a map.
A very simple tool that allows you to select a geolocation/radius and get a list of recent tweets made in that place.
Worldwide map of geotagged Wikipedia Creative Commons Images. To display more information, log in with your Media Wiki account.
Click on a point on the map to get a list of landscapes by famous artists depicting the area.
Worldwide map of geolocated Wikipedia articles. It's possible to enter the name of a locality to see articles about local streets or attractions.
Enter geographic coordinates, language, and get a list of Wikipedia articles about streets, towns, stations and other notable places nearby.
get a list of links to Facebook/Instagram locations linked to geographic coordinates
map for exploring some geologic maps and articles from the NGMDB (National Geologic Map Database).
World's Air Pollution: Real-time Air Quality Index map
click on a point on the map and get the data on the current fishing effort at that location.
Natural Hazards Viewer (worldwide)
lightning strikes in real time and also data on thunderstorms that ended months or years ago
showing the degree of light pollution in different countries. It's possible to see the data over time (since 2013)
Interactive map of open waters, mangroves, swamps, fens, riverines, floodswamps, marshs, wet meadows and floodplains (unfortunately, there are not all countries in the world)
online map of fire hotspots around the world (data from VIIRS and MODIS satellites, last 24 hours)
Click on a shark on the world map and find out its name, size and travel log.
Map of points where there is a risk of significant sea level rise in the event of melting glaciers.
when you click on a freshwater body of water, its detailed map opens, on which the depth at different points is marked
mineral maps for different countries
collection of weather map (wind, rain, temperature, air pressure, humidity, waves etc)
weather history data
shows where it is raining on the map. You can enable notification of approaching rain (in the browser and in the mobile app)
click on the hurricane on the map and get detailed information about it
Weather stats data
Worldwide map of rains, storms, fires, heats, winds and others natural phenomenas
worldwide detailed interactive bathymetry map
big collection satellite, drone and ecological maps
finding the shortest path between two points
3D representation of Earth based primarily on satellite imagery
Map of the world showing the mountains (with absolute and relative altitude and links to Peakbagger, Listsofjohn and Caltopo).
Online map with the most detailed information on Europe's rivers (mostly central for the time being, but the data is being updated): direction and speed, water temperature, depth, slope angle, etc.
Enter the name of an animal, bird or plant to see a map of where it has been spotted.
Enter location and assess the risk of flooding, earthquakes and hail in this place on the map.
Click on any point on the map and trace the path that a drop of rainwater takes from current location to the world's oceans.
Macrostrat's geologic map system integrates over 290 bedrock geologic maps from around the world into a single, multiscale database (c).
Detailed statistics on floods over the last 15 years (worldwide): precipitation levels, flooded area, number of people affected, dates, duration in days, etc.
A site for those who verify the location of a photo by the position of the sun. It is very much inferior in functionality to http://timeanddate.com, but its interface is much simpler.
tool is designed for planning private flights. And you can find an incredible amount of data about the current situation in the sky on it
click on the airport on the map to see the cities from which it's possible fly direct
user updated online database (census) of civilian jet and turbojet aircraft
tracking flights on a map
flight schedules and data on the actual departure/arrival times of flights in the U.S. for more than 30 years (!))
An extension that displays the size of the legroom between the seats next to the flight information.
- get a list of airports by city name; - view the flight schedule of a particular airport; - view the flight schedule of a particular airline; - getting detailed information about a flight and more
tracking a shipping container by number
tracking a shipping container by number
tracking a shipping container by number
search for voyage details by voyage number or ship name
comprehensive archive of the world ships. There is even data for 1820!!!!!!!
submarine communications cables map
online calculation of travel time between two ports (with optimal path). It's possible to select the speed from 5 to 40 knots. Shows a list of the seas through which it passes.
Large catalogue of cruise ship research materials: - map with trackers; - timetables; - webcams on decks and in ports; - elaborate thematic news aggregator
find out the train schedule for a station on a particular day that passed many years ago (since 2008)
Live map of trains for Russia, Belarus, Ukraine, Kazahstan and Abhazia
A terrific weekend travel planning service for Europeans. It shows how far you can go from a certain station in 5 hours by train.
Enter the name of the station to see what cities you can get to by train without changing (+ travel time for each city).
A world map showing real-time train traffic (with route point's exact geographic coordinates) and schedules on the roads of Europe, North and South America and Australia.

Click on a point on the railway on the world map (railways are marked in orange or red) to see a list of rail cab videos from that location. With this service you can see many places where Google Street View has not yet reached!
Detailed information on trains, stations and real-time train traffic for European countries
hiking routes world map
running routes world map
biking route world map
search information about car by venicle numbers (14 different countries from one page) - #GreatBritain, #Norway, #Denmark, #Russian and others
real time info about public transport in 739 cities and towns in the dozens of countries
20 online public transport maps (most real-time) for different cities and countries around the world
graphic index of license plates of different countries of the world
Map of the world with information about the railroad tracks. It's possible to visualize maximum speed, electrification, track gauge, and other parameters.

Online map (+mobile app) for information about various problems on the roads (accidents, street closures, police parking, etc.) around the world. Waze especially interesting because it stores the marks users left a few days or weeks ago.
